content: meet ingrid the octopus her full name is ingrid but friends call her inky she s classy and quick with a color quite pinky she s known for her confident bold kind of way but it wasn t always like that i daresay for when she was young she was ruthlessly teased for the way she would ink when she was displeased and many would laugh at her big squishy head she would approach each new day with anguish and dread but after some time she happened upon an old sea turtle off the coast of taiwan the turtle took note of inky s mind-state and quickly set out to set all those lies straight learn more about ingrid and her life in this beautiful 12-page pdf pattern with detailed instructions and lots of clear pictures over 40 to help you along the way i am always available to help and answer questions as well the crochet pattern is written in english us terms and will be available by download immediately after purchase this crochet pattern is written in us terms and will be available for download immediately after purchase size using dk weight yarn and a size 3 00mm crochet hook ingrid the octopus will end up being about 18 inches from top of head to tip of tentacle skill level ambitious beginner -
